name: snek-ts
description: The classic Snake game. Built using Typescript and HTML5 Canvas.

scripts.build: npm run ts && npm run js && npm run sass && npm run static && npm run image
scripts.start: npm run sass && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "SERVER,TS,JS,SASS,STATIC,IMG" -c "black.bold,blue.bold,green.bold,red.bold,yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "http-server ./dist" "npm run ts:watch" "npm run js:watch" "npm run sass:watch" "npm run static:watch" "npm run image:watch"
scripts.docs: npm run build && typedoc --out docs/ --mode file --module system --target es6 --exclude "src/**/*/index.ts" --readme ./README.md src/ && cp ./.nojekyll docs/ && cp -r dist/ docs/game && mv docs/game/fonts docs/
scripts.ts: tsc && node scripts/build-app.js && browserify tmp/index-built.js -o tmp/index-built.js && babel tmp/index-built.js --out-file dist/index-built.js
scripts.js: browserify src/js/bundle.js -o tmp/bundle.js && babel tmp/bundle.js --out-file dist/bundle.js
scripts.sass: node-sass -r -o dist --include-path node_modules src/styles && npm run css
